settings.title: HELP
settings.description: CAPiTA customer support is here to help. Please select from options below to find answers for commonly asked questions.

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.content: Orders are packed and shipped within 2 business days of receipt. You can view our full Shipping, Returns, and Payments Policy here.

settings.title: How do I return my order?
settings.content: We are happy to help you return your items purchased from capitasnowboarding.com that meet our full Returns Policy. We are not offering returns and exchanges for orders to Canada currently. To start your return, please email us at shop@capitasnowboarding.com.

settings.title: How do I exchange my order?
settings.content: To keep things simple, we offer returns rather than exchanges. You can start a return for the unwanted item by emailing us at shop@capitasnowboarding.com.To best guarantee availability, and to reduce wait time, we recommend placing an order for your desired items.

settings.title: How do I cancel my order?
settings.content: Once an order is confirmed on capitasnowboarding.com we are unable to guarantee any changes or cancellations. These situations can often be resolved viaour return policy. For further assistance with your order please email us at shop@capitasnowboarding.com.

settings.title: Can I preorder?
settings.content: Currently, we do not offer pre-ordering on capitasnowboarding.com. However, many of our authorized CAPiTA Dealers may be able to help.

settings.title: When will an out-of-stock product come back into stock?
settings.content: While inventory may vary, typically we receive one shipment of inventory for capitasnowboarding.com. Most times, once a board is listed as out of stock on the website it will likely not come back into stock until the following season. We’d suggest in this case you use our Dealer Locator to contact an online or local retailer to inquire about their inventory. If you need further help in your search please contact us at info@capitasnowboarding.com.

settings.title: Can I choose my base graphic?
settings.content:
Base colors on graphics may vary for one of three reasons.

  1. Some of our models feature graphic variations that are unique to a specific size. 
  2. Models featuring a die-cut base construction often will have two base color variations per size to maximize material utilization and minimize waste during the production process. While purchasing directly on www.capitasnowboarding.com, we cannot guarantee the base color variation on models with die-cut bases. If you have your sights set on a specific base graphic colorway, you can always head to an authorized CAPiTA Dealer!
  3. Board models offered in wide sizes may feature a different graphic variation in the wide sizes versus the regular waist width sizes.

settings.title: Do splitboards come with climbing skins?
settings.content: Yes, all splitboards purchased on the CAPiTA site will come with skins. The MEGA SPLIT series ships with the Union Pro Splitboard Climbing Skins while the NAVIGATOR SPLIT series ships with the Union Splitboard Climbing Skins. For more information on these included accessories, you can visit Union’s product page at:
